const buffer = require('crypto').randomBytes(60);
const token = buffer.toString('base64').replace(/\//g,'_').replace(/\+/g,'-');
const path = require('path');
 
module.exports = {
  __root: 'port',
  port: {
    default: 3000,
    type: Number
  },

    default: 'public',
    type: [String, Boolean],
    file: true,

        return path.normalize(fullpath);
      }
      return value;
    }
  },
